name: PhiLings Starter Kit - Artist
description: Our PhiLings Starter Kit is a special category product, requiring our consent before purchasing. Products in this locked category require a previous notice for approval from your Master. In order to do so, your Master should contact us with your details first. We limit access to this products for registered profiles at our webshop only,so it’s obligatory to report to your master which email adress you used during your profile registration. After we have access to this information, you will be able to log in and order the kit in few simple steps. This is applied to ensure that you meet the standards for this product listing as well as this product- category specific requirements.Contains: 10x Skin Candy After Care Balm 10ml1x Ultimate Skin Cocktail Box (20pcs x 51 a 3ml)2x Jive (51 a 3ml)2x Tango (51 a 3ml)1x Phi-Ion Pen1x Sterile Electrodes Box = 4x Blister for Phi-Ion Pen (20pcs)1x Simplicity Artist Machine2x Tri-M Box (20pcs)1x Universal Holder3-Round Blades (10pcs)5-Round Blades (10pcs)Phi Wipes Asept (20pcs)PhiFace Mask -After Treatment Mask- Box (20pcs)1x Pencil White1x PhiLings Bag
